nodes.text: Sheffi were a type of small, gray-furred creature with black eyes. In 34 ABY, a patron of the Canto Casino in Canto Bight on the planet Cantonica had a pet sheffi, which the patron carried with them at the casino tables.

A sheffi first appeared in the 2017 sequel trilogy film, Star Wars: Episode VIII The Last Jedi. The creature was first identified in the current canon in the video "Every Creature in the Star Wars Movies", which was released by the Star Wars Kids Youtube channel in 2019.
